data.title: Kingsmen Resources Expands Drill Targets with High-Grade Silver Findings
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

The latest announcement is out from Kingsmen Resources ( (TSE:KNG) ).

Kingsmen Resources Ltd. has reported promising results from its exploration program at the Las Coloradas project, identifying expansive mineralization across the Soledad and Soledad II structures. The company has expanded its drill targets to include a new area, DBD, in addition to previously identified targets, enhancing confidence in the potential for deeper mineralized structures, which could significantly impact future operations and industry positioning.

More about Kingsmen Resources

Kingsmen Resources Ltd. is a company in the mining industry focused on exploration activities. Its primary product is silver, and it operates in the Central Mexican Silver Belt, particularly in the Parral mining district, Chihuahua, Mexico.

YTD Price Performance: -1.37%

Average Trading Volume: 34,899

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Sell

Current Market Cap: C$16.81M

data.description:

The latest update is out from United Corporations ( (TSE:UNC) ).

United Corporations Limited, a Canadian investment company listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX), has announced cash dividends for its various classes of shares. The dividends, declared by the company’s Board of Directors, are set to be paid on May 15, 2025, for shareholders on record as of May 5, 2025. This announcement reflects the company’s ongoing commitment to providing returns to its shareholders and complies with the Income Tax Act of Canada regarding eligible dividends.

data.title: BayFirst Financial Corp Reports Q4 2024 Results
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

BayFirst Financial Corp ( (BAFN) ) has shared an announcement.

On January 31, 2025, BayFirst Financial Corp reported its financial results for the fourth quarter of 2024, highlighting a net income of $9.8 million. The company saw improvements in its net interest margin and completed a sale-leaseback transaction to enhance capital positions for future growth. Despite challenges from autumn hurricanes, BayFirst made strategic adjustments, such as suspending fair value measurements on government guaranteed loans, to align with industry standards and enhance consistency in financial reporting. The company also saw growth in deposits and loans, and emphasized its focus on becoming the premier community bank in Tampa Bay by hiring new teams and expanding its business banking and healthcare platforms.

More about BayFirst Financial Corp

BayFirst Financial Corp operates in the financial services industry, offering a range of banking products and services. The company focuses on community banking and has a network of 12 banking centers across Tampa Bay, specializing in government guaranteed loans and small business banking solutions.

YTD Price Performance: 21.33%

Average Trading Volume: 6,285

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Sell

Current Market Cap: $65.84M

data.title: AudioCodes Reports 2024 Financial Results and Declares Dividend
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Audiocodes ( (AUDC) ) has provided an update.

On February 4, 2025, AudioCodes announced its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year of 2024, reporting a 3.2% decrease in quarterly revenues to $61.6 million, while service revenues rose by 10.9% year-over-year. The company also declared a semi-annual cash dividend of 18 cents per share. Despite the revenue decline, AudioCodes achieved a strong performance in its UCaaS and Voice.ai business segments, driven by increased demand for AI-driven applications and services, contributing to a 35% year-over-year growth in annual recurring revenue to $65 million. This growth underscores AudioCodes’ strategic focus on expanding its recurring revenue streams and enhancing its market presence in AI and managed services, positioning it for improved sales and operational momentum in 2025.

More about Audiocodes

AudioCodes is a leading provider in the unified communications industry, focusing on voice, contact center, and conversational AI applications and services for enterprises. The company places a significant emphasis on the UCaaS and CX markets and is known for its transformative evolution towards cloud software and services.

YTD Price Performance: 1.86%

Average Trading Volume: 92,572

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Buy

Current Market Cap: $306.8M

data.title: Stardust Solar Reports Robust 2024 Growth and Expands U.S. Presence
data.description:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Stardust Solar Energy Inc. ( (TSE:SUN) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Stardust Solar Energy Inc. reported significant growth in 2024, achieving a 94% year-over-year increase in sales of solar PV systems and energy storage solutions. The company completed its primary goal of a public listing on the TSX Venture Exchange and expanded its franchise network to 78 territories. The acquisition of Solar Grids Development LLC has bolstered its U.S. presence, positioning Stardust Solar for further growth and market impact in 2025. The company has over $2M in signed contracts and expects continued expansion driven by strong industry demand and operational efficiency.

More about Stardust Solar Energy Inc.

Stardust Solar Energy Inc. is a leading provider of residential solar energy solutions. The company focuses on solar energy and storage solutions, with a strong emphasis on expanding franchise territories in both Canada and the United States.

data.title: Armory Mining Corp. Advances Projects and Signs Marketing Agreement
data.description:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An update from Armory Mining ( (TSE:ARMY) ) is now available.

Armory Mining Corp. has announced a corporate update and a new marketing agreement. The company is advancing its Ammo Project in Nova Scotia with plans for a Multispectral Survey and is finalizing a technical report for its Riley Creek antimony-gold prospect. Additionally, Armory is working on its 100%-owned Kaslo Silver Project in British Columbia and the Candella II Lithium Project in Argentina, which is under option for development.

More about Armory Mining

Armory Mining Corp. is a resource exploration company focusing on discovering and developing minerals critical to the energy, security, and defense sectors. The company holds a portfolio of projects including antimony, gold, silver, and lithium prospects.

data.title: OSMOSUN Adjusts 2024 Forecasts and Unveils New Strategic Roadmap
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Osmosun ( (FR:ALWTR) ) has issued an announcement.

OSMOSUN has adjusted its 2024 financial forecasts due to deferred revenue recognition from major projects in Mauritania and Saint Kitts, expecting a revenue of €2.6 million and an EBITDA loss of €5 million. The company is finalizing a new strategic roadmap aimed at developing standardized, modular desalination equipment to reduce dependence on large projects and accelerate delivery times, thereby strengthening its market position.

More about Osmosun

OSMOSUN is a leading provider in the water desalination industry, specializing in solar-powered solutions for both seawater and brackish water. The company focuses on providing sustainable water solutions globally, with a market emphasis on innovative, energy-efficient desalination technology.

PVH ( (PVH) ) just unveiled an announcement.

In February 2025, China’s Ministry of Commerce (MOFCOM) added PVH Corp. to its List of Unreliable Entities following an investigation initiated in September 2024. This decision could potentially lead to significant operational challenges for PVH, including restrictions on business activities in China, possible financial impairments, and difficulties in managing inventory and trade receivables.

data.title: Fuller’s Adjusts Share Capital and Voting Rights
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Fuller Smith & Turner ( (GB:FSTA) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Fuller, Smith & Turner PLC announced the cancellation of 700,000 ‘A’ Ordinary Shares held in Treasury, effective 4 February 2025. This action adjusts the company’s issued share capital and affects the total number of voting rights, which now stands at 33,624,849. This adjustment is significant for shareholders as it impacts their calculations regarding shareholding disclosures and transparency rules.

More about Fuller Smith & Turner

Fuller, Smith & Turner PLC is a company involved in the production and distribution of alcoholic beverages. It operates within the hospitality industry, focusing on brewing and running pubs and hotels across the UK.
